pages.text:
Private Events
Home
Private Events
Transform Your Next Private Event into an Unforgettable Experience
Whether you’re planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or a unique team-building event, our state-of-the art facility provides both entertainment and top-notch service.
At X-Golf West Palm Beach, we believe in offering more than just a venue. We deliver a comprehensive entertainment package tailored to suit your event’s unique needs. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, our versatile space accommodates all your guests comfortably, ensuring a memorable day or evening of fun, golf, and camaraderie.
Our team is here to ensure every detail is handled with care, from planning to execution, allowing you to relax and enjoy the event with your guests. With our commitment to excellence and a passion for golf, your event at “The Home of Indoor Golf” will be talked about long after the last putt.
INQUIRE ABOUT PRIVATE EVENTS
X-Golf is dedicated to making your private event a standout success.
Our Private Event Offerings Include:
Customizable Spaces:
Whether you’re hosting a small team-building session or a large corporate event, our adaptable venue can be customized to reflect your theme and meet your requirements.
PGA Pro Lessons:
Add a unique twist to your event with golf lessons, tips or pointers from our PGA professionals, making it an excellent opportunity for guests to refine their skills or swing a club for the first time in a friendly and supportive environment.
Catering Packages:
Delight your guests with exquisite dining options. Our full-service bar and restaurant serve a variety of delicious meals and beverages to keep the energy high and the spirits merry.
Entertainment and Competitions:
Engage your guests with fun golf competitions and leagues, designed to suit all skill levels, ensuring everyone has a great time.
State-of-the-Art Technology:
Our simulators provide detailed performance data, allowing your guests to track their progress and enjoy a deeply engaging golfing experience.

ABOUT X-GOLF WEST PALM BEACH
Home
About
World's Most Advanced & Accurate Golf Simulator
Unlike other indoor golf facilities, X-Golf uses our own proprietary technology that truly separates us form the rest. We’ve spent nearly 20 years perfecting our sophisticated combination of laser, light, impact and camera sensory technologies that collect raw golf data at and around the impact zone. Combined with incredible computing power and custom-built 3D graphics software, X-Golf is the most accurate and comprehensive indoor golf simulator in the world.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
What the Pros Say
X-Golf has received numerous accolades from top golf professionals, and has gained industry recognition and approval for its outstanding technology. “Their technology is the most accurate I have seen in the simulator space”, said Max Homa, 6-time PGA Tour Winner. “X-Golf technology is the best I’ve used, and the venues are so much fun!”, added Paige Spiranac, Golf Celebrity.
LEARN MORE
Host Your Event
Offering more than just a venue...
From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, our versatile space accommodates all your guests comfortably, ensuring a memorable day or evening of fun, golf, and camaraderie.
State-of-the Art Facility
Our simulators provide detailed performance data, allowing your guests to track their progress and enjoy a deeply engaging golfing experience.
Delight Your Guests
Our full-service bar and restaurant serve a variety of delicious meals and beverages to keep the energy high and the spirits merry.
LEARN MORE
Annual Membership
Unlock your best golf yet with an X-Golf membership— just $295/month for 16 play hours, 15% off food and drinks, free entry to Wednesday scrambles, and exclusive member events all year long!
$295 per month
16 hours of peak play per month
Up to 3 guests can join you every visit
15% off food and beverage
Free entry into Wednesday night scramble
Member events and competitions throughout the year
Minimum 3 month commitment
Sign Up Today
